entry.title: First
entry.content:
This is the first blog that I published in this space.

Actually, I have another blog on Netease, which has run since 2010. In that blog, I share my experience on research, life, and also reprint some article that I think good.

I write this blog mainly for learning the new script, that is markdown.

First, let me try how to insert a picture on blog.

A MATLAB plot of the Basin of Attraction for a function. (Image by Yossi Farjoun.)

Second, I want to try the function of highlighting source codes. For example, the followings are some MATLAB codes

This failed!!

Who can tell me the Program language that markdown can recognise? Itis would be very nice!

OK, this is the end!

I will publish all blogs on Linux platform.
